pullRequest.title: Don't print confidential information
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
The authentication is no longer printed on startup. Do we have an test with elastic auth? So we can verify that this still works?

Related issues

closes #4482
Pull Request Checklist

 All commit messages match our commit message guidelines
 The submitting code follows our code style
 If submitting code, please run mvn clean install -DskipTests locally before committing

commit.message:
fix(exporters): don't print confidential information

 The authentication is no longer printed on startup

nodes.bodyText: I would propose to still override toString and keep it blank or something, with a comment that we should not implement it. That way it's less likely that we later add it accidentally. WDYT?

commit.message:
fix(broker): donot print confidential informantion

 The exporter password and username is replaced with stars to not expose
 them when printing the json on broker bootstrap.

chore(elastic): overwrite toString

 Add comment that we dont want to print confidential information
